info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: bo.dossierfacile.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 
Connection: close
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Content-Language: en
Date: Tue, 28 Jun 2022 02:08:46 GMT
Expires: 0
Location: https://bo.dossierfacile.fr/login
Pragma: no-cache
Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=0314C0DDAC040A2BD86926E325D20288; Path=/; Secure; HttpOnly
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 ; includeSubDomains
X-Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'self'
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Request-Id: 84491464-d5c9-4e60-8f73-a0eb32e9f883
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block
Content-Length: 0

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: bo.dossierfacile.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 Connection: close Content-Length: 850 Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate Content-Type: text/html;charset=UTF-8 Date: Tue, 28 Jun 2022 02:08:46 GMT Expires: 0 Pragma: no-cache Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=66703EA627CD9D3DC1A7AA578C12E2D1; Path=/; Secure; HttpOnly Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 ; includeSubDomains X-Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'self' X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Request-Id: 67665647-a493-4876-aa2b-a147851a719a X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Please sign in

Login with OAuth 2.0

Google
curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'Referer: https://bo.dossierfacile.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://bo.dossierfacile.fr/login'
